web.download module¶

class web.download.DownloadDataInfo(url: str, download_folder: str) → None¶

Bases: object

web.download.download_data_from_url(download_info: web.download.DownloadDataInfo) → None¶

Download data from url and store to folder

Parameters:download_info (DownloadDataInfo) – download information containing url and destination folder
web.download.download_data_from_urls(urls_list: typing.List[str], download_folder: str, num_processes: typing.Union[int, NoneType] = 4) → None¶

[summary]

Parameters:
  • urls_list (typing.List[str]) – List of urls for data that need to be downloaded
  • download_folder (str) – Destination folder where downloaded data need to be stored
  • num_processes (typing.Optional[int], optional) – Number of processes to use to download data, by default 8
